resources.string: Share image with scrambled Exif via
Share images with scrambled Exif via
Scrambled Exif needs access to your files to read the images you share with it.\n\nPlease tap on the button below to grant the necessary permission.
You\'re ready to roll! \n\nJust share a picture with Scrambled Exif - it will delete the Exif data and offer you to share it again.
Scrambled Exif needs file access. Please open the app and grant it from there
